# Find lines with key columns after line 5618 \(end of first V_P_LAB_TEST_RESULT block\)
with open\(r''C:\\Users\\fedelir\\Documents\\__extracted__\\SoftLab Patient Results Dictionary.txt'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    lines = f.read\(\).split\(''\\n''\)

# Search for STATE, TEST_ID, RESULT, PRIORITY, GROUP_TEST_ID etc. after line 5618
# These might be in the continuation of the pipe-delimited table
for i in range\(5618, min\(5750, len\(lines\)\)\):
    print\(f''{i}: {lines[i]}''\)
")
